structureSize.description: Default size of underground village structures.

maxDistanceFromCenter.description: Maximum distance structure pieces can generate from the village center.

waterStructureSize.description: Default size of water-based underground village structures.

waterMaxDistanceFromCenter.description: Maximum distance water structure pieces can generate from the center.

enableInGameMessage.description: Show the welcome message with Discord, GitHub, and support links on first join. (Requires restart)
